text: @PressSec @THEHermanCain This is on Trump, his supporters, and perpetrators who continue to ignore warnings from Science. Why didn’t he get Hudroxychloroquine they all believe is a cure? Wear your damn mask, social distance and avoid large gatherings. Covid19 don’t care bout your politics.
